Articles.Content:
**Chaka is going on an important mission**

![MTV-CHAKA.jpg](https://i.ibb.co/PN0TwbT/MTV-CHAKA.jpg)

![image0.jpg](https://i.ibb.co/M89pjb0/image0.jpg)

**[https://teespring.com/stores/chaka-monkey](https://teespring.com/stores/chaka-monkey)**

![Chaka-Store.jpg](https://i.ibb.co/6gTmwdH/Chaka-Store.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2019-02-22T04:05:56Z" title="02/22/2019 04:05  AM" data-short="5 yr">February 22, 2019</time> by YANFRET**

![NEW-LOGO-HALF-SIZE.jpg](https://i.ibb.co/XkjPqDc/NEW-LOGO-HALF-SIZE.jpg) **[► Download Chaka Monkey 161 ◄](https://spacedock.info/mod/599/Chaka%20Monkey%20Exploration%20Systems/download/Chaka_Monkey_161_B)** ![CHAKA-DM1-CUPOLA.jpg](https://i.ibb.co/Jm8mJrg/CHAKA-DM1-CUPOLA.jpg) ![working-document-product-cards.jpg](https://i.ibb.co/StVXDMn/working-document-product-cards.jpg) **Chaka the monkey supports Test Shot Starfish: [https://soundcloud.com/testshotstarfish/tracks](https://soundcloud.com/testshotstarfish/tracks)** **Chaka Monkey Exploration Odyssey is a space program based on NASA and Boeing proposals for future missions. Part models from a wide variety of authors have been licensed, and new original models made, then combined with all new textures, sizes and configurations, to create craft files depicting the proposed missions. This project is modeled at 75% real scale.** **♦ Recommend installing this pack into a clean KSP install for the first time.** **♦ Latest version of Raster Prop Monitor needed for IVA function. Link included in download.** **♦ Copy everything in provided GameData to your GameData** **♦ Copy VAB folder to Ships** **♦ Copy Subassemblies to your save (optional)** **♦ Please remove any previous version files before installing!** **Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems includes products commissioned or licensed from the following authors:** **Winston & Kickasskyle - KW Rocketry** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/) **Alexustas - A.L.C.O.R. Pod** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/) **Alexustas - ASET IVA for Monkey Rover and Mk1-2 Pod** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/) **Bobcat, Ind. American Pack - all rights reserved and belong to BobCat, expressed written permission from Bobcat for American Pack components to be distributed with Chaka** **Tiberion - NovaPunch** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/) **Kosmos Spacecraft Design Bureau - all rights reserved, expressed written permission from Normak and CardBoardBoxProcessor for components to be distributed with Chaka** **Lionhead Aerospace** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/) **Sumghai - SDHI Service Module System** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **Alexey Volynskov (Keramzit Procedural Fairings)** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **BahamutoD - RS-68 Engine - All rights reserved - expressed written permission from BahamutoD for components to be distributed with Chaka** **Sumghai / Fustek / Nothke - Habitats** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **LandeTLS - SLS Block I fairings** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **TALISAR - Talisar Large Upper Stage** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **Porkjet - Habitat IVAs -** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **and expressed written permission from Porkjet for components to be distributed with Chaka** **Blackheart612 - Aerojet Kerbodyne** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/) **expressed written permission from Blackheart612 for components to be distributed with Chaka** **Kommitz - Chaka Nuclear Thermal Engines** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **Nertea - Octo-Girder Argon Segment** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **NoOneSpecial - NOS Altair pod and lander** [**https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/**](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **Hanson Ma / xxhansonmaxx - CST-100 Parachute, Dock Port, and CST-100 pod IVA** [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **CXG2827 - CXaerospace Station Parts -** **All Rights Reserved** **** **(Models and Textures are permitted for modification and distribution by YANFRET in Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems)** **Chaka the Monkey would like to extend a special thank you to these developers. They worked very hard to make these parts and we have organized them for Monkey Exploration because they are excellent.** **Also, Chaka wishes to thank our awesome beta test team: [@Space Kadet](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/166557-space-kadet/) , [@OV-102](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/165002-ov-102/), [@Jarlgnarök](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/175241-jarlgnar%C3%B6k/), [@davidewei](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/168202-davidewei/) , and of course [@MeCripp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/96203-mecripp/) for putting in many hours of science which made the quality of this release possible.** ![qdWsO8.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img908/2193/qdWsO8.jpg) **Special thanks to [@rsparkyc](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/141917-rsparkyc/)** **for updating Procedural Fairings!** **Monkey Rover Wheels provided by:** **![joXUlV.jpg](http://imageshack.com/a/img908/3272/joXUlV.jpg)** **BMW, AG** **Chaka the monkey supports using Raster Prop Monitor by [@MOARdV](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/60950-moardv/)** **LICENSE** **Unless otherwise specified, all materials available for download on this page are copyrighted and released under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 License. [http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/)** **Included plugin licenses:** **Kerbal Joint Reinforcement** is licensed to be distributed only with Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems on express written permission from Ferram4 due to specific critical requirements. Distribution of Kerbal Joint Reinforcement from this download is expressly prohibited: KJR License is GNU GPL v3 [http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html) For the latest version and updates to KJR, please visit [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-1-0-2-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v3-1-3-4-27-15](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-1-0-2-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v3-1-3-4-27-15) **KSPAPIEXTENSIONS** is licensed via Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81496-1-0-2-KSPAPIExtensions-V1-7-4-Utilities-for-shared-mod-use-1-May](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81496-1-0-2-KSPAPIExtensions-V1-7-4-Utilities-for-shared-mod-use-1-May) [CC BY terms (attribution)](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/) **Procedural Fairings** is licensed via Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39512-0-25-Procedural-Fairings-3-10-payload-auto-struts-%28October-11%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39512-0-25-Procedural-Fairings-3-10-payload-auto-struts-%28October-11%29) [CC BY terms (attribution)](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/) **Animated Decouplers** ( Starwaster ) is licensed via Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0) [https://github.com/Starwaster/AnimatedDecouplers](https://github.com/Starwaster/AnimatedDecouplers) [http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) **Edited February 22, 2019 by YANFRET**

Huh... you should get a geocaching travel bug tag for him... There is even a geocache on the ISS.

Here is what a Travel Bug is:  
[https://www.geocaching.com/track/travelbugfaq.aspx](https://www.geocaching.com/track/travelbugfaq.aspx)

And heres the info page for the ISS geocache, placed by Richard Garriott 10 years ago:  
[https://www.geocaching.com/geocache/GC1BE91_international-space-station?guid=611d0635-a1cf-41bc-a0cc-a6038ae288d5](https://www.geocaching.com/geocache/GC1BE91_international-space-station?guid=611d0635-a1cf-41bc-a0cc-a6038ae288d5)

Astronaut Richard Mastracchio (AstroRM) is the only official finder to \*physically\* log the geocache to date. (which is the way its *supposed* to be done) ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

What is the IVA in the Orion supposed to look like?  I have rpm and mechjeb installed, so there are three small mfds on a little console, but I've seen ASETS Orion iva and it's much more... Full.  Did I install wrong perhaps, I thought that's what came with the mod, lol.  I saw that this was discussed before, but like four years ago, and I know rpm is becoming depricated, so idk.

Thanks though, this mod otherwise is beautifully brilliant.

okay man you were right. i finally got a chance to mess with the latest and you can keep the old rd 586 hehe.  wound up with 4 new favorite motors for one old one so pretty good deal. like the carbon edition alcor pods too. thats the way they used to be long time ago right?

Hey, whatever became of this mod?

I've reached out to [@YANFRET](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/90547-yanfret/) about adopting this, but haven't heard back yet

It's a great mod, but needs some work.

Also, as of now, the Procedural Fairings is broken on 1.12, causing crash to desktop issues
